  1. bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.gui
Contents
  1. Description
  2. Classes and Interfaces

Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.gui

package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.gui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddBookingWindow
    GUI window that allows users to add a new booking to the flight booking system.
    AddCustomerWindow
    GUI window for adding a new customer to the flight booking system.
    AddFlightWindow
    A GUI window to add a new flight to the FlightBookingSystem.
    CancelBookingWindow
    GUI window for cancelling an existing booking in the Flight Booking System.
    EditBookingWindow
    GUI window for editing an existing booking in the Flight Booking System.
    InteractiveBookingWindow
    InteractiveBookingWindow is a GUI window implemented using Swing that allows users to create new flight bookings interactively.
    ListBookingsWindow
    GUI window that displays a list of bookings in a table format.
    ListCustomersWindow
    GUI window that displays a list of customers in a table format.
    ListFlightsWindow
    GUI window that displays a list of upcoming flights in a table format.
    LoginWindow
    Login window for the Flight Booking System.
    MainWindow
     
    RebookWindow
    The RebookWindow class provides a graphical user interface (GUI) for rebooking flights in the Flight Booking System.
    RemoveBookingWindow
    GUI window that allows users to remove a booking by providing a customer ID and flight ID.
    RemoveCustomerWindow
    A GUI window that allows an administrator to remove a customer from the flight booking system.
    RemoveFlightPanel
    A JPanel for removing a flight from the FlightBookingSystem by flight ID.
    SearchFlightWindow
    A GUI window that allows users to search for flights in the flight booking system.
    ShowBookingWindow
    The ShowBookingWindow class provides a GUI window that allows the user to search for and display all bookings associated with a given customer by entering the customer's ID.
    ShowCustomerWindow
    The ShowCustomerWindow class creates a GUI window that allows the user to search for and view details of a specific customer by entering their Customer ID.
    ShowFlightWindow
    The ShowFlightWindow class creates a GUI window that allows the user to view detailed information about a flight, including its passengers, by entering the Flight ID.
    UpdateCustomerWindow
    The UpdateCustomerWindow class provides a GUI form for editing and updating a customer's personal information in the Flight Booking System.
    UpdateFlightWindow
    GUI window for updating flight details in the Flight Booking System.
    ViewCustomerWindow
    GUI window for viewing all customers registered in the Flight Booking System.
